Based on the traditional RVR 1960 text, this Bible features the dispensational theology and eschatology first presented by American theologian Dr. C. I. Scofield (1843-1921). features of this Bible include: Introductions to sections and books, brief outline of each Bible book, subheadings throughout the text, 1,700 footnotes, center column references in the Old Testament, side column references in the New Testament, words of Christ in red, a system of subject chain references, index to annotations, guide to Old Testament quotations in the New Testament, concordance, four-color maps, presentation page and family records section, two-piece gift box.
